Data Analytics Approaches for Web Archives

Gregory Wiedeman
University Archivist
M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

Collecting the Web at UAlbany

  • Preserve and manage permanent public records
  • Crawling and preserving albany.edu since 2012
  • Began outside collecting in 2016
  • 1.5 TB of Web Data
  • Collect, preserve, provide access, and encourage use

Twitter Data

  • Detecting Russian bots: it`s
  • Ed Summers apostrophe dataset 40 accounts
  • Collected 14,217 tweets with Twarc

Jonathan Albright, “The #Election2016 Micro-Propaganda Machine”

Working with WARCs

  • .warc file ISO standard
  • Tremendous volume of data
  • Mess of HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Unclear provenance
  • Standard derivative datasets
  • Tools becoming easier to use

Funding availability

  • Mellon Foundation Scholarly Communications

  • NEH Digital Humanities Advancement Grants (Due in January 2018)

  • NEH Institutes for Advanced Topics in the Digital Humanities (for training programs)

  • IMLS National Digital Platform
  • National Archives NHPRC supports access and use of records

Collecting the Web at UAlbany

  • We need partners!
  • Smaller research-focused collections
  • Work with Internet Archive to get older data
  • How can we improve?
